org.magelan.core.style
Class DefaultLineStyle

java.lang.Object
  org.magelan.core.style.AbstractNamedStyle
      org.magelan.core.style.DefaultLineStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, LineStyle, NamedStyle, Style
public class DefaultLineStyle
extends AbstractNamedStyle
implements LineStyle, java.io.Serializable

Defines the default linestyle. This class uses the BasicStroke.

Version:
2.0, 05/2004
Author:
Assen Antov
See Also:

Method Detail

setScale

public void setScale(float scale)
Description copied from interface: LineStyle
Sets the linestyle scale. Note that the scale factor is applied lengthwise only, the thickness is preserved.

Specified by:
setScale in interface LineStyle
Parameters:
scale - the new linestyle scale
